title: [契仔] 大學生搵契爺參加佢地既party

replies.msg:
Calling all 'BBQ Dads': College student and his friends post Craigslist ad for a 'generic father figure' to grill and drink beer during Father's Day party

College student Dane Anderson posted a Craigslist ad looking for a generic dad
Him and his friends in Spokane, Washington are seeking a 'BBQ Dad' to grill burgers and drink beer during a party on June 17th
Anderson said their real fathers don't live in the area and wanted to fill that role
Candidates are also required to 'talk about dad things like lawnmowers and building your own deck'


http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-4569272/College-student-friends-post-ad-BBQ-Dad.html
